title: Dowling Farm
blocka: xxACTION Spend 4 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: The Salty Freetrader
text: Where everybody - every single body - knows your name.
blocka: xxQUICK If a character is at this location, gain one xxSECRETS.
blockb: xxTRAP One character at this location is weary.

title: Whitehold
text: Graycloak headquarters in the breadbasket of the Empire.
blocka: xxDOOM One character at this location is exhausted.
